name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente
Dice bacon and cook until crispy, add minced garlic
Beat eggs with grated parmesan and black pepper
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup pasta water
Mix hot pasta with bacon, remove from heat
Add egg mixture, tossing quickly with pasta water to create creamy sauce
Serve immediately with extra parmesan

name: Thai Green Curry
steps: Cook jasmine rice according to package instructions
Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces
Heat 1/4 cup coconut milk in wok, add curry paste
Add chicken, cook until no longer pink
Pour remaining coconut milk, bring to simmer
Add sliced bell peppers and bamboo shoots
Season with fish sauce, simmer 10 minutes
Stir in fresh basil, serve over rice

name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions
Cube sweet potato, toss with olive oil, roast at 400°F for 25 minutes
Drain chickpeas, season with cumin and paprika, roast alongside potato
Massage kale with lemon juice and pinch of salt
Make tahini dressing: mix tahini, lemon juice, water until smooth
Assemble bowls with quinoa base
Top with roasted vegetables, chickpeas, kale, and avocado slices
Drizzle with tahini dressing

name: Beef Tacos with Pico de Gallo
steps: Brown ground beef in skillet over medium-high heat
Add taco seasoning and 1/2 cup water, simmer 5 minutes
Dice tomatoes, onions, cilantro for pico de gallo
Mix pico ingredients with lime juice and salt
Warm tortillas in dry skillet
Mash avocados with lime juice for guacamole
Assemble tacos with beef, pico, guacamole, and sour cream

name: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad
steps: Cook quinoa, let cool completely
Dice cucumber, halve cherry tomatoes
Finely chop red onion, slice olives
Whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, pepper
Combine all vegetables with cooled quinoa
Crumble feta over salad
Toss with dressing and fresh mint
Chill for 30 minutes before serving

name: Japanese Chicken Teriyaki
steps: Mix soy sauce, mirin, sake, sugar for teriyaki sauce
Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces
Heat oil in pan, cook chicken until golden
Add minced garlic and ginger, cook 1 minute
Pour teriyaki sauce over chicken
Simmer until sauce thickens and coats chicken
Garnish with sesame seeds and sliced green onions
Serve over steamed rice

name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Slice mushrooms, sauté in butter until golden, set aside
Keep broth warm in separate pot
Sauté diced onion in olive oil until translucent
Add rice, toast 2 minutes stirring constantly
Add wine, stir until absorbed
Add broth one ladle at a time, stirring frequently
Continue adding broth until rice is creamy and al dente, about 25 minutes
Stir in mushrooms, parmesan, butter, and thyme
Let rest 2 minutes before serving

name: Korean Bibimbap
steps: Cook rice according to package instructions
Slice beef thinly, marinate with soy sauce and sesame oil
Blanch spinach and bean sprouts separately, season with sesame oil
Julienne carrots, sauté until tender
Slice and sauté mushrooms
Cook beef until browned
Fry eggs sunny-side up
Arrange rice in bowls, top with vegetables and beef in sections
Place egg on top, serve with gochujang

name: Greek Moussaka
steps: Slice eggplant, salt and drain for 30 minutes
Brush eggplant with oil, broil until golden
Brown lamb with diced onions
Add chopped tomatoes, cinnamon, simmer 20 minutes
Make béchamel: melt butter, whisk in flour, gradually add milk
Cook sauce until thick, remove from heat
Whisk eggs into béchamel with half the parmesan
Layer: eggplant, meat sauce, eggplant, béchamel
Top with remaining parmesan
Bake at 350°F for 45 minutes until golden

name: Indian Butter Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, ginger, garlic, and spices for 2 hours
Grill or bake chicken until cooked through
Melt butter in large pan, add remaining ginger and garlic
Add garam masala, cumin, turmeric, cook 1 minute
Pour in tomato sauce, simmer 10 minutes
Add heavy cream, stir well
Cut chicken into pieces, add to sauce
Simmer 15 minutes until chicken is tender
Garnish with cilantro, serve with naan or rice

name: Vietnamese Pho
steps: Char onion and ginger under broiler
Boil beef bones for 5 minutes, discard water
Add fresh water, charred onion, ginger, star anise, cinnamon
Simmer broth for 2 hours, skim foam regularly
Strain broth, season with fish sauce and sugar
Slice raw beef thinly
Cook rice noodles according to package
Place noodles in bowls, top with raw beef
Pour hot broth over to cook beef
Serve with bean sprouts, basil, lime wedges

name: Spanish Paella
steps: Steep saffron in warm broth
Cut chicken into pieces, season and brown in paella pan
Remove chicken, sauté diced peppers and tomatoes
Add paprika, cook 1 minute
Stir in rice, coat with oil
Pour saffron broth, arrange chicken on top
Simmer without stirring for 20 minutes
Add shrimp, mussels, peas in last 10 minutes
Let rest 5 minutes before serving

name: French Ratatouille
steps: Slice all vegetables into thin rounds
Make tomato sauce: sauté onion and garlic, add diced tomatoes, simmer 20 minutes
Spread sauce in baking dish
Arrange vegetable slices in alternating pattern
Drizzle with olive oil, sprinkle thyme, salt, pepper
Cover with parchment, bake at 375°F for 45 minutes
Uncover, bake 15 more minutes until tender

name: American BBQ Ribs
steps: Remove membrane from back of ribs
Mix brown sugar, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne for rub
Coat ribs generously with rub
Wrap in foil, refrigerate 2 hours or overnight
Preheat oven to 275°F
Bake wrapped ribs for 2.5 hours
Unwrap, brush with BBQ sauce
Broil or grill 5 minutes until caramelized
Let rest 10 minutes before cutting

name: Moroccan Tagine
steps: Cut lamb into chunks, season with salt and pepper
Brown lamb in tagine or dutch oven
Add sliced onions, cook until soft
Stir in cumin, cinnamon, ginger, saffron
Add carrots, chickpeas, apricots
Pour enough water to barely cover
Cover and simmer 1.5 hours until lamb is tender
Toast almonds, sprinkle on top before serving
Serve with couscous

name: Brazilian Feijoada
steps: Soak black beans overnight
Cut all meats into chunks
Brown meats in large pot
Add diced onions and garlic, sauté
Add beans, bay leaves, cover with water
Simmer 2.5 hours, adding water as needed
Remove some beans, mash and return for thickness
Slice collard greens, sauté with garlic
Serve with rice, orange slices, and greens

name: Chinese Kung Pao Chicken
steps: Cut chicken into bite-sized cubes
Mix soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, cornstarch for sauce
Heat wok on high, add oil
Stir-fry chicken until cooked, remove
Add dried chilies, cook 30 seconds
Add bell peppers, ginger, stir-fry 2 minutes
Return chicken, add sauce and peanuts
Toss until sauce thickens
Garnish with green onions

name: Middle Eastern Falafel
steps: Soak chickpeas overnight, do not cook
Drain and dry chickpeas thoroughly
Blend chickpeas, onion, garlic, herbs, spices until coarse
Add baking powder, mix well
Refrigerate mixture 1 hour
Form into small patties or balls
Deep fry at 350°F for 4 minutes until golden
Make tahini sauce: mix tahini, lemon juice, water
Serve in pita with vegetables and tahini sauce

name: Swedish Meatballs
steps: Soak breadcrumbs in milk
Mix meats, breadcrumb mixture, egg, finely diced onion
Season with salt, pepper, allspice
Form into small meatballs
Brown meatballs in butter, set aside
Make gravy: melt butter, whisk in flour
Gradually add broth and cream, stirring constantly
Return meatballs to gravy, simmer 10 minutes
Serve with lingonberry jam and egg noodles

name: Turkish Shakshuka
steps: Dice onion, peppers, and tomatoes
Sauté onion and peppers in olive oil until soft
Add minced garlic, paprika, cumin, cook 1 minute
Add tomatoes, simmer 15 minutes until thick
Make wells in sauce, crack eggs into each well
Cover and cook until eggs are set
Crumble feta on top
Garnish with parsley, serve with crusty bread

name: Lebanese Tabbouleh
steps: Soak bulgur in hot water for 15 minutes, drain well
Finely chop parsley, mint, tomatoes, cucumber
Slice green onions thinly
Combine all vegetables with bulgur
Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, salt, pepper
Pour dressing over salad, toss well
Chill for 30 minutes before serving

name: Hawaiian Poke Bowl
steps: Cook sushi rice, cool to room temperature
Cube tuna into bite-sized pieces
Marinate tuna in soy sauce and sesame oil for 10 minutes
Slice avocado and cucumber
Assemble bowls with rice base
Top with marinated tuna, avocado, cucumber, edamame
Sprinkle with seaweed and sesame seeds
Serve with extra soy sauce and wasabi

name: Polish Pierogi
steps: Make dough: mix flour, eggs, sour cream, water until smooth
Rest dough 30 minutes
Boil and mash potatoes
Mix mashed potatoes with cheese and sautéed onion
Roll dough thin, cut circles with glass
Place spoonful of filling on each circle
Fold and seal edges tightly
Boil pierogi in batches until they float
Sauté in butter with onions until golden

name: Ethiopian Doro Wat
steps: Finely dice onions, cook in dry pan until golden
Add butter, berbere spice, cook until fragrant
Stir in tomato paste, garlic, ginger
Add chicken pieces, coat with spice mixture
Pour broth, bring to simmer
Cover and cook 45 minutes
Hard boil eggs, peel and score with knife
Add eggs to stew, simmer 15 more minutes
Serve with injera bread

name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente
Dice bacon and cook until crispy, add minced garlic
Beat eggs with grated parmesan and black pepper
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup pasta water
Mix hot pasta with bacon, remove from heat
Add egg mixture, tossing quickly with pasta water to create creamy sauce
Serve immediately with extra parmesan

name: Thai Green Curry
steps: Cook jasmine rice according to package instructions
Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces
Heat 1/4 cup coconut milk in wok, add curry paste
Add chicken, cook until no longer pink
Pour remaining coconut milk, bring to simmer
Add sliced bell peppers and bamboo shoots
Season with fish sauce, simmer 10 minutes
Stir in fresh basil, serve over rice

name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
steps: Cook quinoa according to package instructions
Cube sweet potato, toss with olive oil, roast at 400°F for 25 minutes
Drain chickpeas, season with cumin and paprika, roast alongside potato
Massage kale with lemon juice and pinch of salt
Make tahini dressing: mix tahini, lemon juice, water until smooth
Assemble bowls with quinoa base
Top with roasted vegetables, chickpeas, kale, and avocado slices
Drizzle with tahini dressing

Add taco seasoning and 1/2 cup water, simmer 5 minutes
Dice tomatoes, onions, cilantro for pico de gallo
Mix pico ingredients with lime juice and salt

Mash avocados with lime juice for guacamole
Assemble tacos with beef, pico, guacamole, and sour cream

Dice cucumber, halve cherry tomatoes
Finely chop red onion, slice olives
Whisk together lemon juice, olive oil, salt, pepper
Combine all vegetables with cooled quinoa
Crumble feta over salad
Toss with dressing and fresh mint
Chill for 30 minutes before serving

Garnish with sesame seeds and sliced green onions
Serve over steamed rice

Simmer without stirring for 20 minutes

Add diced onions and garlic, sauté
Add beans, bay leaves, cover with water
Simmer 2.5 hours, adding water as needed
Remove some beans, mash and return for thickness
Slice collard greens, sauté with garlic
Serve with rice, orange slices, and greens

Heat wok on high, add oil
Stir-fry chicken until cooked, remove

Blend chickpeas, onion, garlic, herbs, spices until coarse

Form into small patties or balls

Make tahini sauce: mix tahini, lemon juice, water
Serve in pita with vegetables and tahini sauce

steps: Soak breadcrumbs in milk
Mix meats, breadcrumb mixture, egg, finely diced onion
Season with salt, pepper, allspice
Form into small meatballs
Brown meatballs in butter, set aside
Make gravy: melt butter, whisk in flour
Gradually add broth and cream, stirring constantly
Return meatballs to gravy, simmer 10 minutes
Serve with lingonberry jam and egg noodles

steps: Dice onion, peppers, and tomatoes
Sauté onion and peppers in olive oil until soft

Add tomatoes, simmer 15 minutes until thick
Make wells in sauce, crack eggs into each well
Cover and cook until eggs are set
Crumble feta on top
Garnish with parsley, serve with crusty bread

Finely chop parsley, mint, tomatoes, cucumber
Slice green onions thinly
Combine all vegetables with bulgur
Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, salt, pepper
Pour dressing over salad, toss well
Chill for 30 minutes before serving

name: Hawaiian Poke Bowl
steps: Cook sushi rice, cool to room temperature
Cube tuna into bite-sized pieces
Marinate tuna in soy sauce and sesame oil for 10 minutes
Slice avocado and cucumber
Assemble bowls with rice base
Top with marinated tuna, avocado, cucumber, edamame
Sprinkle with seaweed and sesame seeds
Serve with extra soy sauce and wasabi

name: Polish Pierogi
steps: Make dough: mix flour, eggs, sour cream, water until smooth
Rest dough 30 minutes
Boil and mash potatoes
Mix mashed potatoes with cheese and sautéed onion
Roll dough thin, cut circles with glass
Place spoonful of filling on each circle
Fold and seal edges tightly
Boil pierogi in batches until they float
Sauté in butter with onions until golden

name: Ethiopian Doro Wat
steps: Finely dice onions, cook in dry pan until golden
Add butter, berbere spice, cook until fragrant
Stir in tomato paste, garlic, ginger
Add chicken pieces, coat with spice mixture
Pour broth, bring to simmer
Cover and cook 45 minutes
Hard boil eggs, peel and score with knife
Add eggs to stew, simmer 15 more minutes
Serve with injera bread

name: Argentine Empanadas
steps: Make dough: mix flour, butter, egg, warm water until smooth
Rest dough 30 minutes
Cook beef with diced onions until browned
Season with cumin, paprika, salt, pepper
Cool meat mixture, add chopped eggs and olives
Roll dough, cut circles
Place filling on circles, fold and crimp edges
Brush with egg wash
Bake at 375°F for 25 minutes until golden

name: Jamaican Jerk Chicken
steps: Blend peppers, allspice, thyme, garlic, ginger, green onions
Add soy sauce, brown sugar, lime juice to marinade
Score chicken deeply, coat with jerk marinade
Marinate for at least 4 hours or overnight
Preheat grill to medium-high
Grill chicken 8-10 minutes per side
Baste with remaining marinade while cooking
Rest 5 minutes before serving
Serve with rice and peas

name: Malaysian Laksa
steps: Cook rice noodles according to package, drain
Heat oil, fry laksa paste until fragrant
Add coconut milk and chicken broth, bring to simmer
Season with fish sauce and sugar
Add shrimp, cook until pink
Divide noodles into bowls
Ladle hot soup over noodles
Top with halved eggs, bean sprouts, cilantro
Serve with lime wedges

name: Irish Shepherd's Pie
steps: Boil potatoes until tender, drain
Mash potatoes with butter and milk, season well
Brown lamb in large pan, drain excess fat
Add diced onions and carrots, cook 5 minutes
Stir in tomato paste, worcestershire sauce
Add broth and peas, simmer 15 minutes
Transfer meat mixture to baking dish
Spread mashed potatoes evenly on top
Fork patterns on surface, bake at 400°F for 25 minutes until golden

name: Indonesian Nasi Goreng
steps: Cut chicken into small pieces, cook until done
Remove chicken, scramble eggs in same wok
Push eggs to side, add sliced shallots and garlic
Add shrimp, stir-fry until pink
Add cold rice, break up clumps
Return chicken, add kecap manis and chili paste
Stir-fry on high heat 5 minutes
Toss in sliced green onions
Serve with cucumber slices and fried egg on top

name: Russian Beef Stroganoff
steps: Slice beef into thin strips
Cook egg noodles according to package
Sear beef in hot butter until browned, remove
Sauté sliced onions and mushrooms until soft
Sprinkle flour over vegetables, stir well
Add beef broth, bring to simmer
Stir in sour cream and mustard
Return beef, simmer 5 minutes
Serve over hot egg noodles

name: Peruvian Ceviche
steps: Cube fish into bite-sized pieces
Boil sweet potato until tender, slice
Boil corn, cut into rounds
Thinly slice red onion, rinse in cold water
Mince aji amarillo and garlic
Mix fish with lime juice, onion, peppers, garlic
Marinate in refrigerator 20 minutes
Stir in chopped cilantro
Serve with sweet potato and corn

name: Australian Meat Pie
steps: Brown beef and diced onions in large pan
Sprinkle flour over meat, stir well
Add broth, tomato sauce, worcestershire sauce
Simmer 30 minutes until thick, cool completely
Line pie dish with puff pastry
Fill with cooled meat mixture
Cover with second pastry sheet, seal edges
Brush with beaten egg
Bake at 400°F for 35 minutes until golden

name: Nigerian Jollof Rice
steps: Season and fry chicken until golden, set aside
Blend tomatoes, peppers, onion, scotch bonnet
Fry tomato mixture until oil floats on top
Add tomato paste, curry powder, thyme
Pour in chicken broth and bay leaves
Add rice, stir well
Place chicken on top
Cover tightly, cook on low 35 minutes
Let steam 10 minutes before serving

name: Portuguese Bacalhau
steps: Soak salt cod in cold water 24 hours, changing water 3 times
Boil cod 15 minutes, flake into pieces
Boil potatoes, slice into rounds
Hard boil eggs, slice
Sauté sliced onions and garlic in olive oil
Layer potatoes, cod, onions in baking dish
Top with egg slices and olives
Drizzle with olive oil
Bake at 375°F for 25 minutes, garnish with parsley

name: Egyptian Koshari
steps: Cook lentils and rice separately
Cook macaroni according to package
Drain and heat chickpeas
Thinly slice onions, fry until crispy
Make sauce: fry garlic, add tomato sauce, cumin, vinegar
Simmer sauce 15 minutes
Layer rice, lentils, macaroni, chickpeas in serving dish
Top with tomato sauce
Garnish with crispy onions

name: South African Bobotie
steps: Soak bread in half the milk
Brown beef and diced onions
Add curry powder, cook 2 minutes
Stir in chopped apricots, raisins, almonds
Add soaked bread, mix well
Transfer to baking dish, smooth top
Beat remaining eggs with milk
Pour egg mixture over meat
Place bay leaves on top, bake at 350°F for 40 minutes

name: Belgian Carbonnade
steps: Cut beef into large chunks, season with salt and pepper
Brown beef in butter, remove and set aside
Slice onions, cook until caramelized
Sprinkle flour over onions, stir well
Add beer, brown sugar, mustard, thyme, bay leaves
Return beef to pot
Cover and simmer 2.5 hours until tender
Remove bay leaves before serving
Serve with fries or mashed potatoes

name: Caribbean Roti
steps: Make dough: mix flour, baking powder, oil, water until soft
Rest dough 30 minutes
Cut chicken into pieces, season with curry powder
Brown chicken in oil, remove
Sauté onions, garlic, ginger, add remaining curry powder
Add cubed potatoes, chickpeas, coconut milk
Return chicken, simmer 30 minutes
Roll dough into thin rounds, cook on hot griddle
Fill roti with curry, fold and serve

name: Singaporean Chili Crab
steps: Clean crabs, cut into pieces
Heat oil in wok, add minced garlic and ginger
Add chili sauce, tomato sauce, sugar, stir well
Add crab pieces, toss to coat
Pour in chicken broth, cover and cook 15 minutes
Mix cornstarch with water, add to thicken sauce
Beat eggs, drizzle into sauce while stirring
Simmer 5 more minutes
Serve with fried mantou buns

name: German Schnitzel
steps: Pound pork cutlets to 1/4 inch thickness
Season with salt and pepper
Set up breading station: flour, beaten eggs, breadcrumbs
Coat each cutlet in flour, then egg, then breadcrumbs
Heat butter in large skillet
Fry cutlets 3-4 minutes per side until golden
Drain on paper towels
Garnish with lemon wedges and parsley
Serve with potato salad

name: New Zealand Pavlova
steps: Beat egg whites until soft peaks form
Gradually add sugar, beat until stiff and glossy
Fold in cornstarch and vinegar
Shape into circle on parchment-lined baking sheet
Bake at 250°F for 1 hour
Turn off oven, leave pavlova inside to cool completely
Whip cream until stiff peaks
Top pavlova with cream and fresh fruit
Serve immediately

name: Filipino Adobo
steps: Mix soy sauce, vinegar, crushed garlic, bay leaves, peppercorns, sugar
Marinate chicken in mixture for 30 minutes
Bring chicken and marinade to boil
Reduce heat, simmer covered 30 minutes
Remove chicken, set aside
Continue simmering sauce until reduced by half
Return chicken to pan
Simmer uncovered 10 minutes until chicken is glazed
Serve over steamed rice

name: Tunisian Shakshuka Merguez
steps: Slice merguez, cook in pan until browned
Remove sausage, sauté diced onions and peppers
Add minced garlic, harissa, cumin
Add diced tomatoes, simmer 20 minutes
Return merguez to pan
Make wells in sauce, crack eggs into wells
Cover and cook until eggs are set
Garnish with cilantro
Serve with crusty bread

name: Hungarian Goulash
steps: Cut beef into 1-inch cubes
Brown beef in oil, remove and set aside
Cook diced onions until golden
Add paprika, stir quickly to avoid burning
Return beef, add chopped tomatoes, peppers
Add caraway seeds and broth
Simmer covered 1.5 hours
Add cubed potatoes, cook 30 more minutes
Serve with dollop of sour cream

name: Scottish Cullen Skink
steps: Poach haddock in milk 10 minutes, reserve milk
Flake fish, removing bones and skin
Dice potatoes and onion
Melt butter, sauté onion until soft
Add potatoes and fish stock, simmer 20 minutes
Mash some potatoes to thicken soup
Add reserved milk, flaked fish, cream
Heat through gently
Garnish with parsley, serve hot
